name: Desert Punk 2D Game Built with OpenGl
name_original: Desert Punk 2D Game Built with OpenGl
description:
"Desert Punk" is an arcade game and kind of endless game, where the player has to evade all of the obstacles inside the track and get much points each time the player successfully evade the obstacles. The Game Over will be triggered if The Character Collides with the Obstacles.

Find the Code at : https://github.com/artalone/Desert-Punk
